question: Write a letter to your boss apologising for the recent meeting you missed at work.Apologise for missing the meeting.Explain what happened.Say what you will do to compensate.
text: I am writing this letter to apologize for missing a meeting to onboard a new client on 12th April 2022.
I am sincerely sorry for not being able to reach the office on time and understand the consequences of not being able to show the partial presentation which was only with me.

I just want to bring to your attention that while coming to the office, I met with a car accident. It took time to complete all the legal formalities which were required to be followed. Moreover, had to get my car towed to the service station and complete the claim procedure.
I request you to approve and give me an opportunity to reschedule the meeting for the 15th of April,2022 where I can present the whole presentation for a smooth transition to onboard the new client.
I hope you excuse my absence and rest assured of my commitments to the organization.
